story.text: Jan 3 American Capital Strategies Ltd. (ACAS.O) said it plans to offer 6 million shares in a public offering. In the offering, 2 million shares would be offered by an affiliate of J.P. Morgan Securities Inc., an affiliate of Morgan Stanley & Co. Inc. and an affiliate of UBS Securities LLC. (Reporting by Rakesh Dubey in Bangalore)
story.title: american capital to offer 6 mln shares in public offering
